summary: A collection of general-purpose helper utilities for Qiskit, covering decorator and methodâ€‘binding tools, deprecation handling, lazy evaluation of optional dependencies, multiprocessing and parallel execution support, and SI unit prefix manipulation.
business_intent: To centralize common auxiliary functionality, making the codebase easier to maintain, enabling graceful handling of deprecated APIs and optional packages, and providing robust support for parallel and multiprocessing workloads while ensuring consistent unit handling across the library.
